fields.name: Attribute
fields.description: The TrackAttribute to filter the tracks by.

fields.name: ChannelMapping
fields.description: Optional designation for single channel audio tracks.  Can be used to combine the tracks into stereo or multi-channel audio tracks.

fields.name: Filter
fields.description: The type of AttributeFilter to apply to the TrackAttribute in order to select the tracks.

fields.name: FilterValue
fields.description: The value to filter the tracks by.  Only used when AttributeFilter.ValueEquals is specified for the Filter property.
